articles.author: Erik Sherman
articles.title: 94% of the Fortune 1000 are seeing coronavirus supply chain disruptions: Report
articles.description: Almost 94% of the Fortune 1000 have major suppliers in the most heavily affected region of China.

articles.author: Ian Mount
articles.title: As coronavirus cases overwhelm China’s hospitals, those with other problems are told to leave
articles.description: A growing number of patients with urgent medical conditions have become collateral damage as China struggles to gain control of an outbreak that’s now claimed over 2,000 lives.

articles.author: Ian Mount
articles.title: Richard Branson’s Virgin launches cruise line just as coronavirus batters the industry
articles.description: Ships will boast interiors by Tom Dixon and Roman and Williams and offer gym programs, yoga, 20 restaurants featuring Michelin-standard food and entertainment including drag acts and sets by star DJs.

articles.author: Alan Murray
articles.title: Don’t underestimate the economic effects of the coronavirus outbreak
articles.description: Markets have largely been laid back about Covid-19's spread, but the contagion continues.

articles.author: Karen Yuan
articles.title: ‘Looking more probable’—analysts up the odds of a markets correction as coronavirus fears surge
articles.description: Investors are underestimating the coronavirus impact on corporate earnings, a closely followed analyst says, and that could lead to a markets correction.

articles.author: eamonbarrett
articles.title: A week of corporate coronavirus warnings starts to quantify the economic toll of China’s outbreak
articles.description: In earnings calls and quarterly reports, global companies are beginning to contemplate the fallout of Covid-19.

articles.author: Claire Zillman, reporter
articles.title: Coronavirus epidemic enters new phase as cases outside of China spike
articles.description: Where China had the vast majority of cases and deaths before, there are now signs that infections are spreading more rapidly within other Asian countries beyond its borders.
